mapper.select:
select
from sys_menu m where m.del_flag!=1 and exists(select 1 from sys_group_menu mg inner join sys_group_user gu on mg.group_id=gu.group_id where m.id=mg.menu_id and gu.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) order by m.sort

select
from sys_menu m where m.del_flag!=1 order by m.sort
